column4: i have intel 945GM on board graphic card and i installed ubuntu jackalope : my screen resolution is currently at 800*600. i use to work before in 1024*764 and at the moment at display manager that resolution is not there. can someone help me ?

i have intel 945GM on board graphic card and i installed ubuntu jackalope : my screen resolution is currently at 800*600. i use to work before in 1024*764 and at the moment at display manager that resolution is not there. can someone help me ?
not sure if it's fixed or not.. I don't have a computer with an intel graphics card myself
check the file /var/log/Xorg.0.log .. it lists what X thinks of your graphics card, monitor and so on
